name: Bryant the Giant: Goes to Work
name_original: Bryant the Giant: Goes to Work
description:
Get Bryant to work without attracting the attention of the police.  Any time you accidentally knock something over or squash someone, people around you will be suspicious.  Get enough attention and the police will be called!

Get yourself to a hiding spot and hope they'll leave you alone.  All you want to do is get to work!

Controls:

Keyboard:
Move: WASD or arrows
Hide: Spacebar
Quit: Hold esc

Xbox Controller:
Move: Left stick
Hide: A button
Quit: Hold B button

Made by
Ollie Versteegen
Lead Design & Programming, all game sounds, UX

Simon Long
3D art and animation

Rhys Wittingslow
Design, Programming, 2D art
